short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format text for LinkedIn posts and comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of plain text? Elevate your posts with these game-changing features:
🔹 𝗕𝗼𝗹𝗱 & 𝘐𝘵𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘤 Text – Highlight key points effortlessly
🔹 • Bullet Points – Keep your ideas organized and crisp
🔹『Code Blocks』 – Share code like a pro

💡 How to Use:
1️⃣ Draft your post, comment, message, or article
2️⃣ Select the text you'd like to format
3️⃣ Use the button below to apply formatting

✅ Free, lightweight, and seamlessly integrated with LinkedIn’s interface.
